item.title: Add neptune.ai
item.description: https://neptune.ai/ - Log, store, display, organize, compare and query all your MLOps metadata. Free for individuals: 1 member, 100 GB of metadata storage, 200h of monitoring/month

item.description: https://www.markup.io/ - MarkUp lets you collect feedback directly on top of your websites, PDFs and images.

item.description: https://meercode.io/ - Meercode is the ultimate monitoring dashboard for your CI/CD builds. Free for open-source and 1 private repository.

item.title: Add DynaPictures - added free plan limits
item.description: https://dynapictures.com - Design automation tool which lets you dynamically generate images over REST API. Change colors, texts, logos and images on the fly. Free plan includes 30 generated images per month and 3 image templates.

item.title: Added Themeselection
item.description: https://themeselection.com/ - Selected high quality, modern design, professional and easy-to-use Free Admin Dashboard Template,

item.title: Add integromat
item.description: https://www.integromat.com - Workflow automation tool which lets you connect apps and automate workflows using UI, it supports many apps and most popular APIs. Free for public GitHub repositories, and free tier with 100 Mb, 1000 Operations and 15 minutes of minimum interval.
